_comments.dce_parameters: DCE-related parameters (dcePrefix, dceSuffix) are only used when createDCE=true in operation-parameters.json. DCEs are created in the same resource group as the DCRs.
_comments.dcr_naming: Script will automatically abbreviate table names if the full DCR name exceeds length limits (30 chars for Direct DCRs, 64 chars for DCE-based DCRs)
_comments.naming_limits: Direct DCRs: 30 chars max, DCE-based DCRs: 64 chars max. Prefix and suffix are preserved, only table names are abbreviated.
_comments.azure_ad_auth: tenantId and clientId are used for Azure AD authentication in Cribl Stream destinations. Client secret will be set to '<replace me>' placeholder for manual configuration in Cribl Stream.
_comments.subscription: subscriptionId is used to automatically set the Azure subscription context when running the scripts
